footnote:
</br><hr style="border-top:1px solid #0778be"/>1 This word was substituted for the word "punishable" by Bom. 19 of 1959, s. 12.</br><hr class="hr2"/>
2 These words were substituted for the words "one month", by Bom. 19 of 1959.</br><hr class="hr2"/>
3 These figures were substituted for the figures "100", by Bom. 19 of 1959.</br><hr style="border-top:1px solid #0778be"/>
content: Whoever is a member of an opium smoking assembly shall, on conviction, be 1[punished] with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to 2[three months] or with fine which may extend to 3[Rs. 500], or with both.
